entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 5:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
